Coronavirus COVID-19

coronavirus Link: /section/coronavirus

Colorado coronavirus latest numbers, June 16

There are 29,299 cases of COVID-19 in Colorado, up from 29,130 the day prior. Hospitalizations continue to trend down.

Link: /article/news/health/coronavirus/colorado-coronavirus-update-latest-numbers-june-16/73-1834e6cf-58a8-4ff4-b002-3b59b329e872
